title: D-branes and Matrix Theory in Curved Space
abstract: We discuss the relation between supersymmetric gauge theory of branes and supergravity; as it was discovered in D-brane physics, and as it appears in Matrix theory, with emphasis on motion in curved backgrounds. We argue that gauged sigma model Lagrangians can be used as definitions of Matrix theory in curved space. Lecture given at Strings '97; June 20, 1997.
